drupalNodeEvent.title: Books without Covers: Reading Digitized Texts

field_description.processed: Digitization of books, periodicals, and other documents offers researchers easy and convenient access to the texts that are essential to scholarly work. We have all, the speaker imagines, taken advantage of digital collections to check a quotation, search important terms, or simply read works that reside, in their full physical form, only in far-distant libraries and archives...(read more at event page)
